project_description: A simple Flutter application that switches between displaying a cat text with a clock icon and a dog text with a person icon when the text is clicked.
architecture_overview: The project follows a modular architecture with separation of concerns. It uses the Cubit pattern for state management and adheres to the one class per file principle.

files.name: lib/main.dart
files.description: Entry point of the Flutter application. It sets up the Cubit provider and displays the HomeScreen.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the application.

files.name: lib/cubits/animal_cubit.dart
files.description: Defines the AnimalCubit which manages the state for the animal displayed on the screen.

methods.name: toggleAnimal
methods.description: Toggles the animal state between cat and dog.

files.name: lib/models/animal.dart
files.description: Defines the Animal model which represents the state of the animal.

methods.name: toJson
methods.description: Serializes the Animal object to a JSON map.

methods.name: fromJson
methods.description: Deserializes a JSON map to an Animal object.

files.name: lib/screens/home_screen.dart
files.description: Defines the HomeScreen widget which is the main screen of the application.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the home screen.

files.name: lib/widgets/animal_widget.dart
files.description: Defines the AnimalWidget which is a reusable widget for displaying the animal text and icon.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the animal widget.

widgets.name: HomeScreen
widgets.description: The main screen of the application which displays the AnimalWidget and manages the state using AnimalCubit.

widgets.name: AnimalWidget
widgets.description: A reusable widget that displays the animal text and icon.

cubits.name: AnimalCubit
cubits.description: Manages the state of the animal being displayed, toggling between cat and dog.

methods.name: toggleAnimal
methods.description: Toggles the animal state between cat and dog.

models.name: Animal
models.description: Represents the state of the animal (name and icon).

dependencies.name: flutter_bloc
dependencies.purpose: State management using the Cubit pattern.

sequence_diagram:
@startuml
actor User
User -> HomeScreen : Tap on animal text
HomeScreen -> AnimalCubit : toggleAnimal()
AnimalCubit -> AnimalState : Update state
AnimalCubit -> HomeScreen : Emit new state
HomeScreen -> AnimalWidget : Rebuild with new state
@enduml
state_management_flow: The AnimalCubit controls the state of the animal. When the user taps the animal text, the toggleAnimal method is called, which updates the state. The new state is then emitted, causing the HomeScreen to rebuild the AnimalWidget with the new state.
navigation_flow: The application has a single screen, HomeScreen, which is displayed when the app is launched. The HomeScreen contains the AnimalWidget and manages its state using AnimalCubit.
